DOC.brief_summary: The study objective develop tailor base strategy ovarian stimulation IVF patient use AMH , BMI , antral follicle count ( AFC ) . 300 patient randomize 2 arm : 1. control group : standard care rec FSH . 2. study group : modify dose Rec FSH base AFC correction factor base BMI basal AMH level . Primary endpoint : number mature follicles egg collect egg retrieval ; amount rec FSH use . Secondary endpoint : fertilization rate ; cleavage rate ; clinical pregnancy rate ; inhibin B AMH level ovarian stimulation .
DOC.brief_title: Tailored Ovarian Stimulation Based BMI , AMH , AFC
DOC.detailed_description: The study objective develop tailor base strategy ovarian stimulation IVF patient use AMH , BMI , AFC inhibin B . 300 patient stimulate rec FSH antagonist pituitary inhibition protocol , randomize ( random computer generate number ) 2 arm : 1. control group : standard care recFSH base age , basal FSH AFC . 2. study group : modify dose Rec FSH base AFC correction factor base BMI basal AMH level . FSH administration : 20IU per antral follicle ( 2-5mm ) correct follow : Correction factor AMH : < 1 pMol/L X4 1-6 pMol/L X2 7-18 pMol/L X1 > 18 pMol/L X0.5 BMI 16.5-18.5 X0.75 18.5-25 X1 25-30 X1.25 30-35 X1.5 35-40 X2 Primary endpoint : number mature follicles egg collect egg retrieval ; amount rec FSH use . Secondary endpoint : fertilization rate ; cleavage rate ; clinical pregnancy rate ; inhibin B AMH level ovarian stimulation .
DOC.criteria: female infertile patient eligible IVF treatment polycystic ovary untreated thyroid pathology hypogonadotropic hypogonadism untreaed hyperprolactinemia study drug hypersensitivity previous OHSS unilateral ovariectomy genital malformation BMI > 40
